articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Christopher Columbus was a Sephardic Jew from Western Europe, study finds - New York Post
articles.description: The 15th-century explorer Christopher Columbus was a Sephardic Jew from Western Europe, Spanish scientists said on Saturday, after using DNA analysis to tackle a centuries-old mystery.
articles.content:
MADRID – The 15th-century explorer Christopher Columbus was a Sephardic Jew from Western Europe, Spanish scientists said on Saturday, after using DNA analysis to tackle a centuries-old mystery.
